name: Beverly Stokley
text: These guys rock!  My previous lawn service company had gotten my lawn into such poor shape, I thought we might have to re-sod parts of it. I had bald spots, weeds and yellow grass all over the place. It was ugly. The Southern Lawns guys turned it around with just one treatment!  Within a month or so, my lawn was looking lush and green again. They are very responsive and address any concerns or questions promptly and cheerfully.  And, their prices are less than the other guys! Quality, courtesy and a reasonable price. What's not to love?

resp.text: Thank you so much Beverly for the kind review! We are so glad you're happy with our services!

name: Martin&Susanne Sweet
text: Thanks to Southern Lawns we've got the best looking lawn in the cul-de-sac. The weeds are under control.

name: Bam Boo
text: My new yard was full of weeds , now it’s weed free!  Would definitely recommend !

name: Melissa Kirkland
text: The best lawn care service in Auburn!! My family has been using Southern Lawns for years and their quality service and products can’t be beat. Top notch professionals, friendly and my yard looks the best it has ever looked. Also, love the mosquito repellent service as my 4 year old loves to play outdoors. It makes a huge difference! A++

name: Robin L
text: Very professional and reliable, and our lawn looks great!!!  I highly recommend Southern Lawns.  Plus, their prices are far more reasonable than TruGreen's prices!!

resp.text: Robin, thank you for taking the time to leave us a review and we're thrilled you're so happy with your lawn!

name: Judy Hinton
text: I have worked with Mike Willett for too many years to remember and he is great. He is a real pro you can always depend on and I'm alway getting positive comments about my yards. Mike and Southern Lawns are the pest in the industry. Rod Hinton

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to leave a review Judy! We are so happy to hear you're happy with Mike's work!

name: kay meriwether
text: Have been using Southern Lawns for a few years now. Always very nice and always come when scheduled. I know they have been behind with all the rain and trying to catch up. If I have to leave a message they always return my call promptly. Very pleased and would recommend.

resp.text: Thank you so much Kay and we appreciate your patience when the weather gets us behind. We're glad you're happy with the work we do. We appreciate you!

name: Drew Gunn
text: You're not going to find a better group of people to do business with. They are always fair, courteous and friendly. We've been using them at our office, Thompson Insurance, for a couple of years now and they always do a great job. I highly recommend them over any others we've tried in the past.

name: Anna McKee
text: Southern Lawns has made all the difference in our yard!  An added bonus is the mosquito control service.  Very reliable and great customer service!!  I highly recommend them for all of you lawn care needs!

name: Dave Stever
text: Used Southern Lawns years ago and decided to get back with them again! Great job and will tell you exactly what you need for your lawn! No more fire ants in  my yard and yard looks wonderful! Great folks that come out to your house and very friendly! Thanks for your hard work!

name: Brandon Mack
text: Friendly people, great communication.

resp.text: Brandon, thank you so much for the kind review! We appreciate you!

name: Bob Hunt
text: The people at Southern Lawns seem nice but after two years of their treatments I mostly have crabgrass. I used to have a nice lawn but they destroyed it telling me these treatments were ok for centipede grass but apparently not. Beware!!!

name: Lauren bishop
text: Professional, friendly, and easy to work with! I am so thankful to have found Southern Lawns. I was referred to them by a friend. The monthly mosquito treatment is a must if we want to be comfortable being outside during the warm months.

name: Shawn Cook
text: Great company with awesome customer service and yard care specialists. Cannot beat the price and the results are great. I would highly recommend.

name: laurie miorana
text: Just started services with Southern Lawns and so far we are pleased. Great customer service and price and they treat all our lawn care needs.

name: Jon Dorman
text: Have only had our house in Columbus GA since July but so far Southern Lawns has taken great care of us.  The previous owners used them so we kept the service active...

name: Michael Pacer
text: Great company...great people.  My builder put sod directly over clay.  Southern Lawns has worked with me over the past 3 years to improve soil health.  The have customized treatments based on soil samples and have routinely given me advice on improving the soil.  Today, I have beautiful green grass that grows uniformly throughout.

name: warrick henry
text: Great service. Always calls ahead. Treat problem areas without being asked.

name: Bill Ingalls
text: Southern Lawns are the best!   They are very knowledgeable and my yard looks great!   They work with their clients to improve the soil structure.   I strongly recommend them!

name: Stephen
text: I used another service before who promised to keep my yard true and green but for a hefty price. So far, Southern Lawn has done just as good a job but for a fraction of the price. I'll write another review when I see if Southern Lawn can kill the button weed in my yard that the other service never could defeat. The customer service is much better than the competitors as it is nice to deal with a local person who is friendly but still be able to pay my bill online. I highly recommend Southern Lawns.

name: Melanie Ward
text: We've used Southern Lawns for years and they are awesome and always accommodating.  We moved within Auburn and are using their services again.  Very nice people, great quality of work, and affordable prices.  Highly recommend.

name: Michelle Turrentine
text: I've had a wonderful experience with Southern Lawns. They answered all my questions and were very knowledgeable about everything lawn related. They are professional and courteous - a good all-around company!

name: Sue Linares
text: Very happy with this service. They are always professional and have never over promised or under delivered. We recently had an issue with mole crickets and they were super knowledgeable about a treatment option and took the time to educate me and explain. I would definitely recommend them.

name: Accounts Payable
text: Love this company! We use them for mosquito treatment and they are the best!

text: The work that these guy do are amazing. The 4 large trees kept the sun from fully shining in our backyard and when the first tree fell we could see the difference. The guys seem to work well together and they clean up was professional and thorough. I will recommend this company to others. Great job!

resp.text: Bernard, we are pleased to serve you.  Our crew and office staff our happy to know that you're happy and satisfied with our services. Thank you so much.

name: Kelly Campbell
text: National Tree Service removed three really large trees for me. They were quick, professional and did a really impressive job. I would absolutely use them again and would highly recommend them to you too!

resp.text: Miss Kelly, we thank you for allowing us to serve you. We are so glad that we've met your expectations. Your positive comment made our crew and office staff proud. We will continue to strive harder to provide quality tree services to our dear clients.  We appreciate you a lot.

name: Jaime and Elsa Hensley
text: Recent storms/strong winds caused a very high pine tree to topple over. It was close the street and over our driveway. National Tree Service was the most responsive company to help out with our emergency. They offered great pricing and within an hour were at my house to cut up the tree. Anthony and main office maintained me updated as they cleared up the toppled tree. Anthony went above and beyond to get this unexpected project taken care of.

resp.text: Dear Jaime and Elsa, Anthony and the rest of NTS crew work really hard. Hearing good and positive reviews from our clients really make their day. Thank you so much for trusting National Tree Service for your tree service needs.

name: erica dozier
text: Be sure to do thorough research. Wish I had. I saw the BBB rating without reading current complaints.  The tree was removed but the stump grinding, which I paid for, was not performed. I have contacted the company twice but received no response. I will file a complaint the the BBB, if only to record the service. Hopefully more people will read the complaints and the BBB will reflect this in the company's rating. They are dishonest and unprofessional.

name: Jared Wilkinson
text:
Had NTS come out and quote me on a tree removal. They were double what a competitor quoted. When I gave him the number he said he would do it for that, so be sure you get multiple quotes before using them. He said they would be out the next day at 10-11am. They showed up at 2p the next day, which is fine, and proceeded to cut down the trees. They did a great job with the removal and cleanup to the curb. The minus one star was for the person who came the next day to pickup the debris. He got all of it which was great but left 4" gouges in the yard which I had to dig out and fill up.

I do think you should give them a shot and if they are the best price, use them. Just be sure to check around when having work done to get the best price.

resp.text: Jared, we appreciate for giving us the opportunity to serve you and for your positive review. We will keep on striving to improve  to provide our clients a safe and cost effective solution for all their tree service needs. Thank you.

name: Philip Gannuscio
text: I recently had National Tree Service out  to my home to remove several large pine trees and grind a couple of  stumps. Nationals representative, Anthony Taylor, came out to give me a quote. He was extremely professional and really knew his stuff.The next day Anthony and his crew showed up and removed my trees , handled my stumps , and cleaned up any and all branches and debris. I was very impressed with the professionalism of the entire  company. Anthony ( and National) delivered what they promised and I have already referred them to clients , neighbors, and family members .Truly awesome company

name: James Taylor
text: Great knowledgeable staff! Very fast, responsive and friendly! Give them call for all your tree needs!

name: The Good, Bad & Ugly Properties
text: AwEsOmE!!  National Tree Service did an outstanding job cutting a tree for us. I was working with my sons on a screen printing job &  told him I’m stepping out to grab a bite to eat & see how those tree cutters are doing. On the way I stopped by our property & saw NTS already finished & left. I snapped a photo & texted a son who was also amazed. Towards the end of the day I thought to myself  I'll email or call them to ask what's the quickest way I can make my payment because we are happy customers. When I sat down at the computer, voila! NTS already emailed me the invoice which allowed me to conveniently make  payment online. As we folk in Alabama say, "Gracias". Thanks for your assistance National Tree & I look forward to calling you again. – Antonio Espinoza

resp.text: Mr. Espinosa, we're so glad that you're happy with the tree service we provided to you. We work hard to make sure to provide our dear clients the quality service they deserve. Thank you so much for allowing us to serve you. Of course, KUDOS to our crew members...nice job guys! You made National Tree Service proud!

name: Ryan Hoffman
text: This is by far the most unprofessional company I have ever hired to do work at my house. To begin with, the estimator came out and gave me a price on having 2 trees cut down and having the stumps ground - trees are in the back yard behind a locked gate. I was told to expect a phone call that afternoon for scheduling. After 3 days I called the office and was told that they never received my estimate but they would put me on their schedule. A date was set and then was moved several times. I scheduled someone to come do bobcat work around that date as well. I then received a call asking if they could come that day (Thursday) and do the work. I said yes and left my office to go home and meet them. They finally showed up around 4:45 in the afternoon and got one tree down and told me that they would be back at 8:30 am the next day. I had to call the office at 3 pm to see if they were still coming to finish the work since I had to take another day to stay home from work. I waited to hear back and was told that they should be out sometime that afternoon. The crew finally showed up around 5:30 pm. They were able to get the second tree down but did not have the equipment to grind the stumps and I was told that they would come Saturday morning to finish up. Saturday came and went without anyone showing up and no phone call. The following Wednesday I get a call from the office asking if I was happy with the work and to confirm that they had removed all the debris from my yard, I told the person on the phone that they were not supposed to remove debris but they were supposed to grind stumps. She was unaware of this and said that she would make a note of it and have someone call me. Later that afternoon I got a phone call letting me know that someone would be out the next morning to grind stumps. I waited the entire day at home after taking off work, again, and NTS was again a no call no show. At this point I gave up on having anyone come complete the job. A couple weeks later, the company showed up without calling to try and finish grinding 2 stumps. The guy told my wife that he couldn't finish because there was some concrete and rocks that the didn't initially see and that he would need to come back later to finish the work. At this point I have had to call and cancel on my bobcat guy twice, which has cost both of us money. This job was started in April, and it is now the end of May. If you don't have anything to do and want to work with a company that is completely incompetent with communication, then National Tree Service should be ok. Otherwise, do yourself a favor and stay clear.

name: Ismael Torres
text: Don't use their service, repeat don't use their service. On July 29-2020, they send Samuel to price a job. Now the day before coming to do the work one of their employees came to tell us that Samuel the guy they send to price the work they would be doing, is not qualified to make the quote. The guy that came today from the office said that the job is $2,500 more on top of the quote. This is unacceptable and shows how unprofessional they are. For that reason I don't recommend them.

name: Vic Mobley
text: I called to see if they had firewood and asked what time they close. I drove out there at appox.12:30-12:45 in the afternoon.  When I arrived ALL THE PARKING SPACES in front of the business were filled with cars. I parked along the road and went to the door s and they were locked, didn't see anyone inside so I knocked then went to my car, drove inside the fence to the building and yelled inside, "Is anybody here?", and no one answered....So I left.

resp.text:
I apologize for the inconvenience Mr. Mobley. We were out for lunch when you stopped by and crews were out cutting trees down that's why no one was at the office. I hope that you let us know when and what time you would come to make sure that somebody will be at the office to accommodate you.
Thank you.

name: Brian Kendrick
text: Communication is the key to any business. I can't say enough about the hard work the crew put in to get the job completed. After some equipment issues, NTS returned and finished the job. The quote and pricing was below other competitors and the professionalism shown by NTS is first class. I would definitely recommend this company.

resp.text: Brian, you are right, communication is the key to success. We apologize for the inconvenience it may have caused you. We will handle this matter and ensure that the communication between us and our clients will be improved. Thank you so much for trusting your tree service needs with us.

name: Daniel Minor
text: Awesome VERY Professional Job done here. The staff was very friendly and the work was done as requested. I have 5 more problem trees in my back yard that will need to go. I will be calling again soon. Thank You!!!!!!!

resp.text: Hello Daniel! Thank you for the compliment. Our goal is to satisfy our clients. And we're very glad that you are happy with our services. Just give us a call when you're ready to work on your other problem trees. As always, we'll be honored to work with you again. We appreciate you so much!

text: Took three days of calling to finally get a rep to come to the house and give an estimate.  Rep was hours late from when they said he would be there.   Tree was scheduled to be cut down 2 days later at eight in the morning.  Crew never showed up.  Called the office and said they would call back with what was wrong.  Never got the call.  We used this service a few years ago and it was night and day difference in the response and price.

resp.text: Ashmen000, we are not going to make any excuses for what happened. You're absolutely right, the fault is on our side. The scheduling was mishandled and we deeply apologize for what you've experience with us lately. On the other hand, we appreciate you for informing us about this incident. We will definitely look into this so it won't happen again in the future. We're hoping that you'll give us another chance to redeem ourselves. Thank you for being a loyal customer.

name: Elle Johnson
text: Well look what popped up to be reviewed. I was going to roll with the punches since the company was a sub under Woodland Homes but since old Google wants to know...my opinion. Horrible company!!!! If I could give it a negative star I would. This company has no pride in their work. They laid our sod all kind of crazy in the dead of winter and didn't roll it properly. If not careful one could easily break an ankle. They turned our sprinkler heads against the house and garage like idiots and quite a few were broken. It's the work of 2 year olds. And, it's a non warranty service so there lies the problem. If most are doing a job they never have to return to then they are not going to put too much pride in doing the job. Every home in this subdivision has issues with the sprinkler systems Largen installed. Company and companies who use and treat people unfairly...well we all know what happens. I would never recommend a company who lacks integrity and customer satisfaction. They are horrible!

name: Dan Lambert
text: Called and made an appointment for the next morning for service, between 8 and noon.  Got a call later in the morning from office manager  that the serviceman wouldn't make it until that afternoon.  Waited around all day.  Not another call.  Nothing.  Next day, nothing.  Literally just dropped their commitment without so much as phone call or a "Sorry!"  Really poor.

name: Kimberly Sexton
text: We had a horrible experience with Largen. They just didn’t show up serval times when they were scheduled to install sod and irrigation for us. After about three weeks of not showing up or calling to cancel, we told them we no longer needed their services. However, they put us in a terrible bind for the company that was scheduled to install our fence! The landscaping they did complete- flower bed- the bushes are wrong and the mulch is skimpy! Parts of the area isn’t even covered. I would not recommend using Largen for any of your landscaping needs.

name: Richard Morgan
text: Did a very good job, exceeding my expectation.

name: Joel Anderson
text: Beware of this company.  Absolute false charging of hours worked.  I used them to repair my irrigation system. Although I do not have any problem with the quality of the work they performed, I do have a problem with their billing. When I first called them to ask for an estimate was told they would not be able to provide an estimate only do the work because in figuring out what was wrong with the system they would be doing work towards fixing it. I understand that. I was told they charge $75 per hour on the job plus materials. I was ok with that. It took some time to get out to me but eventually they came out.  They came out late afternoon on a Friday.  I showed them the problem and provided pictures of the system when it was being installed. They spent no more than 30 minutes in my yard. I asked if they could tell me about how much I should expect it to cost. I was told that it really depends on how long it takes and how much damage the system had (I understand that too) and told it should be less that $500. They said they would return next week to do the work. It was more than two weeks and several calls before I was able to get them to come back and do the work. They arrived at 8:00AM and were gone by 10:30AM. I received a bill for $477. The bill only said labor and materials. I called for a better itemized breakdown and was informed the person that handled that was out but he would call me back. After two weeks and another call I did get a call back. I asked for the material cost and how many hours I was billed for. He said they charged 4.5 hours and a hundred something for materials. I told him that was not correct and that they were here no more than 3 hours.  Here is the kicker folks. He said they charge for the drive to and from my house!!  That was the additional 1.5 hours!!  He said I should be happy that they came in under the max they said it might be!! Seriously. I told him I was going to spread this as widely as I possibly could and he did not seem to care. Please see if you can find someone else to do your work for you other than Lucky Lawn.

name: IAM azing
text: Matt is great.

name: Bella Nelson
text:
I called early spring to add new zones to the irrigation system that Lucky Lawn originally installed.  Was told they were backed up and it would be a couple months.  After a couple months I called again, they sent 2 in experienced men who told me they don’t add on or extend zones but can adjust and check for breaks.  They then severed my fiber optic cable, charged me a lump sum $100 to relocate one mister and left.  I reluctantly paid, and called again, left message and no return call.  It’s now been over 6 months, Summer is almost over and still nothing.

I guess I’ll be learning how to install irrigation and maintenance.  Thanks for the false promises and being left hanging.  RUDE!!!!

I decided to keep the service if they would return to treat my entire lawn as a portion of my lawn was untreated due to a locked gate. Over two weeks later I had not received a follow up from the company. I called to inquire about the issue and a very rude young lady answered the phone and spoke to me in a very condescending manner. She kept explaining to me that they will call me before the follow up, to correct the issue. Due to her rudeness and the odd delay in correcting the issue to keep my business,  I decided that I did not want the service at all. She told me she would have the owner call me and slammed the phone down in my ear. I am happy I decided that this is not the company for my needs.

name: C. Kent Riley, DMD
text: We decided to try TruGreen of Mobile about a year ago, and initially the service seemed to be marginally effective at weed control, fertilizing, and pest control.  However, over time, we noticed the results became less & less apparent, and the invoices seemed to become higher & higher.  Then, finally at some point last winter, there was some apparent weed spraying along my property’s entire fenceline that left behind a 3-foot wide swath of dead grass, which became painfully obvious when the lawn came out of its winter dormancy in late March 2021.  All TruGreen tech had to say was that it must’ve been from a cold winter & some other BS, and that maybe it would eventually grow back; however, none of our many other neighbors that don’t use TruGreen, but do have the same type of centipede grass, the same type of shadow box fence, and the same type of winter weather showed no signs of this kind of problem.  So, I have to call B.S. on this lame-brain & accept-no-responsibility explanation.  TruGreen management was notified numerous times about this complaint, and we never got a reply from anyone about it.  Needless to say, we were forced to cancel this expensive & negative impact lawn service.  Now, I have the wonderful task of ripping-up thousands of square feet of dead grass along my entire fenceline, and purchasing expensive & dirty sod to put it all back myself.  Then, I have the wonderful task of watering it all back to health very early in the morning for the next several weeks.  Thanks TruGreen! 👏

Called and spoke with manager named Brandon, he was suppose to come out Weds to take a look, never showed or called.  Waited a day still no show or call.  I also referred to co workers months ago and never received referral discount. Have canceled service and will be going with another company.

In fact, neighbors began asking what we were doing -told them to call TruGreen and now they have lawns to be proud of too.  They provide services according to your individual needs and budget!!  You don’t have to be at home- they leave you a TruGreen tag on your door stating what they did.  AND, if you need them or have a concern, just a quick call and it’s handled.  TruGreen has maintained our lawn for 4 years... we know how great they are!!  We look forward to weekends now..NO YARD WORK... more time with family & friends ..THANKS to TRU-GREEN!!

text: They are not worth inviting to your lawn. After paying fully for their crappy first service, I have discontinued them and  they have the gall to bill me $20 for backing the "discount" from that payement. DO NOT SIGN CONTRACT! THERE ARE MANY SERVICES IN THE AREA THAT ARE GOOD, HONEST AND RELIABLE!  response to the owner, I did not disclose my real name as I do not trust you, in fact i just received another mail with the demand of $20. NEVER AGAIN!

resp.text: Mr. Narcisco, I am having difficulty locating you as a customer in our system. name: Danny Phillips
text: As our lawn began to green up this spring it was looking really good...until Trugreen has started their "treatment".  Now the backyard has large dead spots, and there are large yellow and dead spots in the front.  We now have the worst yard in our neighborhood-far worse than our neighbors who don't do anything to their yard, except for our next door neighbors who use them, too, and whose yard is almost as bad as ours.

resp.text: Mr. Phillips, I am having a problem locating your account in our system. Is it perhaps under a different name? Our goal is 100% satisfaction, and we assure you that we will always go the extra mile to ensure it. With our yearly lawn program we offer free service calls to our customers, so that if you are ever experiencing any issues with your lawn we can send a trained technician to your home for free to ensure that your problem is taken care of promptly. We did experience a particularly harsh winter this year, so winter injury is more prevalent than usual but we strongly believe in our product and our technicians ability to combat it. Please give us a call at the office  at your convenience so we can discuss this further and develop a plan of action.

name: John Mickler
text: TruGreen is courteous and professional on every visit.  I feel like I getting a good value for my money.

name: Debra Hibbert
text: Always friendly and professional  with the added benefit of giving me suggestions on how to improve my lawn.

name: Brenda Taylor
text: They treated my yard and my neighbors last year with NO improved results. I ask to speak to the manager. Sent them pictures of my yard afterwards and still almost a year later no response. This year my yard looks terrible. Will have to figure something else out. Can’t  trust these people. They really DONT CARE!!!

resp.text: Ms Taylor, I am sorry you didn't get the results you expected. I wish you would have stuck with our agronomic plan. My records show that you only took 2 treatments early in 2018 and your neighbor took only one application. With our rainfall plus weed & pest pressure we have found it takes treatments throughout the year and not just once or twice in the spring to eliminate weeds and correct problems that have existed for years. I am also sorry your lawn looks terrible this year. Hopefully you continued to care for it after you stopped our service almost 12 months ago.

name: Bob & Carolyn
text: They are prompt and courteous.  Whenever it looks like my lawn has a problem, weeds, et cetera, I call and they are right on the spot taking care of it.  I appreciate them very much.

name: *Chevy Meg*
text: Rian was amazing and super sweet! She helped me make my yard so green!!!! I would highly recommend

resp.text: We appreciate your business, thank you!

name: Christina Rollo
text: Fantastic service, always friendly & knowledgeable! Exactly what you want in a Lawn Care service!

name: Catherine McCaslin
text: No fuss. They do all the work and apply everything at the right times. I do not have to call and get things corrected because they have already identified the problem and are working on it.

resp.text: Thank you Catherine!  That is our goal. It is hard to hit that goal sometimes in Horticulture since we are dealing with the environment so thank you for sharing your experience.

name: Paula Thornhill
text: Great  people to work with!  Very knowledgeable and dependable!

name: Kevin Jones
text: I have dealt with TruGreen for years and have been extremely satisfied with their service and the way my lawn looks. Thank you

name: Dave Riddle
text: Our lawn has never looked better!

name: Susan Brown
text: These guys have done a fantastic job on my lawn for years and are always professional and courteous! Great job!

resp.text: Thank you for your kind words Ms. Brown.

name: Nicole Barker
text: This company offered a discount for services if I would put my card on file.  Came and did the services but Then charged my card the full amount. Which is fine accidents happen. When I called back to have them fix it the first time they said it would be handled they saw the mistake. I waited a week for the credit to go back which it never did.  Then when I called back the second time the lady was so rude and unwilling to give me the credit but offered to try and discount it on next times services   Agreed that it should not of been charged that way but not helpful in getting it credited.  So now I have to dispute with my credit card.  I clearly would not recommend this company to anyone.

resp.text: Ms Baker I'm sorry for the confusion but you were to receive a $20.00 discount for signing up for our auto charge billing option and agreeing to our yearly program. You did not want to continue with our program, which is fine, but you cant quit the program and still receive the discount. This was explained to you and is printed on every marketing piece we use. I'm sorry again for the confusion.

name: Riland Jones
text: Ok at first, then they started charging me randomly during the month for services without ok. I ended my service 2 years ago and I have begged them to stop calling me, put me on a no call list and I still get calls. Will not recommend to anyone

resp.text: Mr Jones I am afraid you may have our South Alabama location confused with another TruGreen. I attempted to look up your account and we have no record of you ever being a customer. We are a small family franchise and my wife and I are the owners. We never charge customers without their approval and for that matter never call customers ever unless it is to schedule a requested service. Please give our office a call @ 251.653.3242 if you would so we can find the TruGreen location you were working with and help you reach out to them to resolve any issues you may have.  Sincerely, Randy McQueen Owner/Manager

name: Larry Thompson
text: Great lawn service. Couldn't ask for any better.

name: Michael Garner (Mik3ron)
text: First treatment made a big difference.  Will continue with further treatments and report back.

name: Lucy Kerlin
text: The worst if you want weeds that look like plants they were not treating yard right side yard died paying premium price go somewhere else tied of pulling weeds when it was there job but they did not do there job.

name: Chris Harper
text: Great customer service and attention to detail.

name: Mike Lipp
text: If you want a dead lawn, call these guys! I have used them for years in other states. These jokers are ridiculous!!!

resp.text: Mike I'm sorry you had a bad experience with TruGreen locations in other states.  If you ever get down to the Gulf Coast give us a call. We are a small family owned franchise and my wife Elizabeth and I are the owners. We are both Degreed Horticulturists, Volunteer our time and resources to spreading Horticulture to Schools and Senior Centers and Donate to help provide landscapes for Habitat for Humanity. Maybe  we could change your mind that we are "jokers" and "ridiculous".  Thanks, Randy McQueen

name: Sue Rich
text: Very professional and friendly

name: Lauren Wiggins
text: This company has the WORST customer service I have experienced in quite a while. If I could give negative stars I would. After speaking to the office manager about a problem we experienced, she took it upon herself to cancel our service. My complaint was about a note left on our door by one of her employees, which I felt was very unprofessional and rude. She dismissed my complaints and told me they actually did me a favor by coming back out and spraying and didn’t understand why everyone is so offended these days.  This was all started by a feedback email I received from them. If you don’t want someone’s opinion about your services- don’t ask. I wouldn’t recommend this company to anyone.

name: Paul Sochocki
text: Nice folks. Good company.

name: Giant Slayer
text:
I cannot express my gratitude for the kindness, helpfulness, and service that was given to me by Mr.
Lacey. He was very patient with me as I asked a million questions and was more than willing to help equip me to do as much for myself as I desired. His services are extremely affordable, and I am very pleased with the outcome of my lawn, which was once covered in weeds.

name: John Blankenship
text: One of the best companies for your vegetation needs

name: Kimberly Sue “Kim” Abbott
text: Most honest, knowledgeable, and straightforward company I have ever contracted with.  Thank you for my peace of mind on my yard.

name: Taylor Locke
text: Great lawn service. My yard looks so much better since they've started treating it.

name: Robert Ortiz
text:
This company got in touch through Angie's List and within one business day, I had a very reasonable estimate and they were ready to start work.  So far, these guys seem to be professional, friendly and enthusiastic.

As far as I'm concerned, I'd recommend this company any time.

name: Patrick Jarrell
text: Adam is truly a fair and wonderful person He takes great pride in his work and always strives to exceed your expectations I would not ever change Lawn Mowing Services again ! Fair prices and perfection I highly recommend A&E Lawn and Landscaping Thank you Adam and staff. PJarrell

name: Mara Mars
text: I was having the hardest time ever to find a professional and affordable lawn care service here in Dothan. I absolutely do recommend A&E Lawncare. Very fast, diligent, and polite people! 10/10

name: Matthew Butler
text: Great company and the two guys that come do the work are honest plus very fair with pricing. They work very hard and very fast. My yard looks great after every mowing. Great service and I would recommend them to everyone.

name: L.A. Jones
text: Jason keeps my lawn done all year, and does a fabulous job on privacy fences! By far the best outdoor service provider in the Wiregrass!

name: Nelly Kelly
text: T & J Lawn Care draw a landscape plan that we are delighted with, and which incorporates all the things we wanted to achieve in our new garden. We are extremely impressed with the service provided, turned out better than we expected. Thanks again. You run a great family business.

name: Cathy Solis
text:
T & J Lawn Care performed phenomenally great work on the landscaping of my yard. The crew was punctual and efficient in installing a two foot rock border around the perimeter of my home. It not only looks beautiful, it provides a weed & grass free barrier whereby eliminating any future damage to my vinyl siding from weed eating.

T & J Lawn Care has earned a Five Star Rating!

I highly recommend their kind, courteous, professional personnel as well as their strong work ethic and commitment to excellence!

name: Jack Negri
text: Thank you! Your team did a great job on the lawn and I will definitely refer you to my friends and family.

name: John Poitras
text:
Good rates great job done every time.
Professional and courteous.
Thank you

name: Johnny Skinner
text: Ben had great prices and does awesome work!

name: Charlotte Poitras
text: Does an amazing job!

name: April Kindley
text: I work there its great

name: Donnie Armstead
text: I wouldn't rent on or let him cut my grass so unprofessional

resp.text: Hi, Donnie Armstead As a growing, local business, we take these matters very seriously. Our company does not rent properties, and we have no record or recollection of any customer interaction fitting this account description for lawn maintenance services. If this is not a true client account, we ask this review be removed promptly to ensure our true clients and employees can be a part of Coldwater Landscapes for years to come.

name: GORDON HOOD
text: Their staff is always friendly and professional.

name: Jenna Richardson
text: Great company with fantastic employees!

name: Melissa Scofield
text: They did a great job on our fence! I’m so glad we chose them and will recommend them from now on!

resp.text: Thank you, Melissa!

name: James Kaye
text: The landscape designer and lawn care specialists came out to my home to go over what I was looking to do, but after going over the details nothing they came back with was even close to what we discussed. I told the lawn care guy that I wanted to fill in my grass with more St. Augustine, and do a more vigorous regimen to make it look like a golf course. All he sent me was the same thing trugreen did, but double the price. The designer told me she needed 2 weeks to get the plan together, but after 4 weeks she wouldn’t return my calls, and after finally getting her on the phone over a month later, acted surprised that I didn’t receive her email and said she’d resend, never received any email from her. Go somewhere else, because they must not be hurting for business.

name: Neel Shukla
text:
Did not provide service that was agreed upon.  Strung along with little to no communication for months, preventing me from using another service since the job can't be done during the wet fall/winter. As of now, I haven't heard from them for 4 months! Unacceptable!

I'm surprised to see such good reviews based on my own experience. Probably fake reviews from employees or family.

Because they don't communicate and have screwed me over for the year,  I don't think I trust then for any future service

name: Josh Martin
text: Great work those guys do

name: Michael Henderson
text: Excellent service!

resp.text: Thanks, Michael!

name: Donna Robbins
text: Huge professional co

Good people and merchandise.

Store is closing within the next couple of weeks.

name: Micah Harris
text: The Pro's at Flo-Lawn Care took care of my yard like Champs. Thanks for doing everything you said you would do and beyond. You won't regret giving these folks your business!

resp.text: Thank you for the review Micah.

name: Christy Oyer
text: My lawn looks amazing! Excellent pricing!

resp.text: Thank you for the review Christy.

name: Diana Linton
text: These guys are very perfessional. And do a wonderful job.
