text: Excellent place for all your landscaping needs flowers grass cutting irrigation any landscaping needs these people are perfect

resp.text: Thanks so much for the kind words. Have a great day!

name: Robbie Clark (Hammer)
text: Great staff even better services

resp.text: Thank you so much for taking the time to leave a review for us, Robbie! We really appreciate it and your business!

name: momo effy
text: Stupid idiots like to show up and start doing stuff at 6 in the morning, with ZERO regards to how many people are still asleep. Yeah they make the bushes look a little better, but they will wake you up 2 hours before your alarm clock!

resp.text: Momo – We’re very sorry for the inconvenience! Please email info@landscapeworkshop.com with your contact information and property name, and we’ll look into this for you. Thanks for letting us know, Landscape Workshop

name: Rigoberto Avilés M.
text: Great work

name: Jennifer & Richard
text:
We are so happy that we chose CTC for our outdoor kitchen and fire pit project! The whole experience exceeded our expectations. Jay was always available to answer questions and give updates. He also has impressive design skill and vision, but was flexible to accommodate our thoughts and ideas. The entire crew at CTC are talented, hardworking and excel at what
they do. We will definitely use them again for future projects!

name: Terry MacDonald
text: They were a delight to visit to get the landscape stones I needed.  They made recommendations to try to match the landscaping stone I currently have.  They suggested that they deliver it for me a very reasonable price. I highly recommend CTC Landscape Supply.

name: Darrel hancock
text: Good variety of plants. Very busy with plant sale. Very polite people.

name: Tony Wallingsford
text: Jay and his folks are always easy to work with and very friendly.

name: Tracy Rye
text: Friendly and helpful. Bought ferns here for my wedding

name: kdupree7965
text: Great place to do business. I would highly recommend. Great prices too

resp.text: Thank you so much! We appreciate your business and the kind words!

name: Ron Troxtel
text: In and out fast friendly staff recommed to anyone looking for a good landscaping company

name: bigtymn2k6
text: Great pricing and easy to work with. Designed the flower beds and provided service as promised.

name: Chase Nelson
text: Exceptional service!

name: Wayne Blockel
text: Always make time for emergencies and arrive on time and are very professional.  I've used them several time for both emergency and non-emergency calls and they have been great!  Highly recommend Sprinkler Medic for all your irrigation system needs.

name: Terry Brown
text: They were quick reacting on a Saturday evening  to evaluate my leak and had it rebuilt by Sunday  morning,  830. The leak was after the main cutoff and before the sprinkler cutoff so the main would have had to be off to stop it from leaking. They also redesigned the the whole line from the main cutoff  to the sprinkler cutoff making it up to code and functionally perfect. You can barely tell they were there so clean up was excellent too. I will use them in the future.

name: Johnnie Grate
text: Sprinkler Medic came to perform irrigation winterization.  They were prompt, thorough, and courteous.  The previous irrigation company (Raintree Sprinkler Systems) was just the opposite in every way.  I highly recommend Sprinkler Medic for your irrigation needs.

resp.text: Thank you for the great review! We look forward to working with you in the future and greatly appreciate your business!

name: Dissatisfied Customer
text: Promptly paid for 10min service call. Representative failed  to provide a quote on ways to improve my current irrigation system. Called to follow up on the quote with no response.

name: John Jeffery
text: Josh was on time, fast and professional.  Highly recommended!!!

name: Carlos M. Fernandez
text: Awesome response time. Josh was super helpful, understanding and accommodating. Highly recommend. Thanks for your business ethics.

resp.text: Thank you Carlos! We appreciate the business and great review!

name: Chris Henke
text: I called them because my system was constantly running if the water main was open. They came out the following day and had it running properly in just a few minutes. Their price is fair, and from my experience fast service and no hassle. I will call them again for future sprinkle system needs. Highly recommend.

name: John
text: Found problems with my system. Gave me details on what repairs were required. The price was great, the work was done quickly ,yard was left clean and I would use this company again if needed.

name: Aaron Atkins
text: I had a non-functioning sprinkler system I was delaying on repair, and Chris and team had everything working in just a few hours!  I'm not sure why I even put it off...Excellent customer service, great price, very professional!  Highly recommended.

resp.text:
Thanks so much for the kind words Aaron! Glad we could get your sprinkler system sorted out and back on track.

Looking forward to working with you in the future!

name: Laura Seeber
text: Can't say enough good things about Josh and Sprinkler Medic! I had a prob with another company that hit my sprinkler system and Josh went ahead and dealt directly with them since they were the ones paying. A LOT of calls and red tape. He got my sprinkler system all fixed and as a side effect a few other sprinklers weren't working because of dirt clogs from all the work and mishaps. He came back out and fixed everything. Great job and stands by their work.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the great review! We look forward to doing business with you in the future.

name: Caren Bevill
text: Called to locate valves lost by cable contractors and Josh was quick and professional.  Would call again if I needed sprinkler related assistance.

name: jarrod lancaster
text: Josh and Chris went the extra mile to ensure a flawless repair. Highly recommend their services for anyone looking for irrigation repair or service.

resp.text: thank you jarrod, we look forward to working with you in the future!

name: Jeremy Owen
text: Great group of people, fair prices and very professional.

name: Dallas Phillips
text: This company came quickly but I made mistake of not asking for price. I figured at most it would be $100. The job was installing 1ball valve and about18 inches of pvc pipe.I already had the pipe exposed.I was charged $170. He said the rate was $85 a hour with a two hr. Minimum. At that rate this company should be rich. For 8 Hours of work that would be $680 a day. He worked about 15 minutes AND WAITED for 30 minutes for glue to set.Pretty good money for a sprinkler repairman. I don't know if doctors make that much?

resp.text: 680$- parts, insurance(we do carry it unlike others), fuel, service van (with paint still attatched), service technicians (in uniform, not a “work for beer t-shirt”)  and a guarantee that is actually worth something... ? Sounds like you got a great deal. We aren’t doctors, we are great irrigation repair technicians. Thank you for the business. We hope to serve you in the future.

name: Casey Perkins
text: I used them in the past and the quality of the work was great. They did state they would tidy up some spaghetti wires on one of the sprinkler boxes that they did not do. I am assuming because the project was more labor intensive than he had expected so cut his loss. Tried to get them to come out to give me a quote to move some sprinkler heads. The appointment got cancelled then rescheduled by them. The 2nd appointment they was a no show and did not call to reschedule. I am assuming it is a busy time and probably forgot to put it on his appointment book since it was a Saturday quote. But still I felt it should be noted and after looking at other companies this appears to be a pattern for this time of the year (April-September).

name: Sherman Ellis
text: The co owner has personal  problems.

name: Dakota Lee
text: I let my yard get completely out of control and way overgrown. Roman Lawn Care came in and completely turned it around. My lawn looks so beautiful and manicured now! Thanks so much for your great work and professionalism! It feels so good to come home to a pretty yard again. And my dogs love it too.

resp.text: You are very welcome. We appreciate you giving us the opportunity! Thank you 😊

name: Angie Spurlock
text: Flower beds look better than they have in a long time! Super happy with Roman Lawn Care and will definitely continue to use them in the future!

resp.text: Thank you!! I look forward to helping again.

name: Justin Koblas
text: Always do an incredible job!

resp.text: Always a Pleasure.

name: Tracy Houze
text: Excellent, professional, and very friendly. Love your work!!!

resp.text: Thank you!! We strive to be a step above all other Lawn care companies! We appreciate you!

name: Charletta S. Sanders
text: Complete Excellence That's all I'm going to say!!!

resp.text: Thank you. We appreciate your business. It has been a privilege being your choice of Lawn service.

name: Brian Lindsey
text: Always “Johnny on the spot”. Great Job!!

resp.text: Thank You!

name: Gerald Sanders Sr.
text: Very Professional!!!!! Great Service!!!!

resp.text: Thank you for choosing Roman Lawn care. We strive for excellence.

name: Martha Lane
text:
Our project manager, Brock, and his team (Aaron and Adalid) are THE reason I would recommend Sexton to friends or family.

Last year, our beautiful wooded yard was decimated during hurricane Sally. Due to having a new baby and the pandemic, and for almost a year it had remained a mess and source of anxiety for our family. We signed on with Sexton in hopes of restoring its previous beauty in a new way.

My nerves were completely put at ease the day Brock and his guys arrived to start the demolition process. Brock always had the attitude that he was there to bring our family's vision to life. He provided guidance any time it was needed, but was equally willing to let us give direction or make changes. He never once complained or seemed frustrated when unexpected weather or challenges arose. Brock, Aaron and Adalid created a fun work environment, but it was never at the expense of their professionalism or work ethic. They showed competence in all areas, including restoration, irrigation, and installing the plants. Brock and his guys truly knocked it out of the park, and I finally love looking out of my windows again.

resp.text: Mrs. Lane, thank you so much for those kind words. Our team is only great because of our great people and that crew is one of our best. Thank you so much for your business and we will certainly be sure to pass this along to Brock and his team.

name: Paul Hurlburt
text:
Sexton’s came to do a total front yard makeover. Two trees, plus several large and difficult shrubs. Oh.. and that 8 ft clump of bamboo were removed. 60+ new flowers and smaller shrubs added. Lighting added to remaining trees and front porch pillars. Not to forget, a total irrigation system in front plant beds. Very reasonably priced.
Call Ashley, and she’ll give great recommendations on what to do. Chad the foreman, and his hard working crew, very pleasant to work with. Yard was left in pristine condition, and now is the envy of the neighborhood. I would greatly recommend them for any yard service they have.
Just remind Chad to bring the doughnuts! 😎

resp.text: Mr. Hurlburt. Thank you so much for the review. Looks like we might owe you some donuts again! LOL

name: Carol Stonr
text: I have been happily using Sexton Landscaping for about 2 years for lawn fertilization/pest control/irrigation install.  I recently contracted with them for a large landscaping job in my backyard due to installing a new pool. My first contact was with Pam in sales. She listened to all our needs/ideas and worked up a plan for a beautiful backyard oasis. When it came time to turn her vision into reality, the team sent to do the work were professional, knowledgeable, and clean. I want to single out Jason and Andre as going above and beyond.They worked tirelessly in the heat for the better part of a week. Jason kept in constant contact with us to make sure everything was progressing as we wanted. We are in love with our backyard now.  We noticed one issue with our sprinklers not reaching an area yesterday. I texted Pam and within a few hours Jason and Andre were out to fix it.  I highly recommend Sexton Landscaping for all your needs and especially Pam, Jason, and Andre.

resp.text: Mrs. Stone, Thank you so much for those kind words. Jason, Andre, and Pam are all Rock Stars at our organization. Thank you for letting the rest of the world know:-) We will be sure to get them something special on your behalf.

name: Richard Friedman
text: We decided to use Sexton to do a full overhaul of our front and side yard after they were devastated from the storms in 2020. Despite the issues everyone is having with materials and labor, the guys at Sexton were able to get the job done. My wife and mother in law are both in love with the finished product. Special thanks to Brock, Aaron, and Adalid for their hard work. Brock especially, who demonstrated the kind of diligence, attention to detail and integrity that is rarely found and cannot be taught. Sexton is lucky to have him.

name: Marcia Muller
text: We engaged Sexton to landscape our back yard after losing many large trees in a recent hurricane.  Brock and his team cleaned up and rebuilt our beds, planted trees and hedges, and repaired our watering system.  We were very happy with the work, and especially appreciated their patience with having to move a tree several times to get it in just the right location.  The entire company was very easy to work with and responsive during the planning and scheduling stages of our project. They also treat our lawn and are doing a nice job with that as well.

resp.text: Mrs. Muller, thank you so much for the kind words. We all really do appreciate them. We actually read these out loud on Monday morning so this will help us get motivated next Monday morning!:-) It is a pleasure serving you and we are happy that you are pleased with our work.

name: scotty johnson
text: From the sales, Pam, to our installer, Brock, they did an incredible job with new design. It looks great and worked with us on every decision to make sure we’d be happy with it.

name: Marilea Gordon
text: I called Sexton's for help with an erosion problem that has left other professionals scratching their heads. Designer Pam Pace happily came to my rescue. This was a big task with many complicating factors. Pam created a plan which would solve current and future issues as well as provide beautiful and functional outdoor spaces. The incredible team of Cesar and Matthew were led by outstanding project manager Chad Mason. They took great care in every detail and made thoughtful adjustments along the way. Communication with Sexton's from my initial inquiry until the completion of the project was excellent. The job site was active every weekday without fail. Work days concluded with detailed progress discussions and work area clean up. I could not be happier with the beautiful results! It was a pleasure getting to know Pam, Chad, Cesar, and Matthew.

resp.text: Thank you Ms. Gordon for your kind review. We are so pleased that we were able to take a vision and make it a reality for you. We value the relationship we have built with you and please feel free to call us again!

name: James Miller
text: I cannot say enough great things about the Sexton team.  They recently completed a landscaping project around my house and did an amazing job.  I worked with Pam on the front end to get all the details worked out, and then Matthew and Andre did an incredible job installing everything. Very professional, courteous and respectful. Thank you to everyone at Sexton for what you have done.

resp.text: Thank you soooo much Mr. Miller. Its been a pleasure serving you over the years.

name: Annette Judd
text: Our fourth landscape project with Sexton Lawn and Landscape was just completed and it is beautiful! The team, led by Austin were excellent to work with in their professionalism, attention to detail, and knowledge of their craft. Sid Sexton has always taken our visions, incorporated his expertise and provided us with a dream come true. This company also handles our monthly lawn health care, sprinkler maintenance and mosquito control spraying. We highly recommend their services.

resp.text: Mrs. Judd thank you so much for your kind words and your business. We all appreciate it very much!

name: Jerry Kuczero
text: After making a lot of changes in my back yard, I called Sexton to see about getting some sod.  I told Tim what I wanted done and he told me what Sexton could do and how they'd do it.  Johnathan and his crew came in and did everything right, including making sure the irrigation system was doing its job and taking out a section of cement so I could enlarge the yard.  It came out great, as you can see from the pictures.  (Tree was removed by another company.) So, last year,  I had them take care if the front.  This time, it was Pam who told me what they could do for me and it was, again, Johnathan, Alex and crew that did a terrific job on the installation, which included sod, a walkway and re-doing a flowerbed.  They made sure I knew what was happening every step of the way.  Sexton also followed-up after the job to make sure there are no problems.  Every service and job they've done has been top-notch and it's a pleasure working with the company.

name: Suzanne Foster
text: We met with the designer, Pam Pace, to discuss our need for some updated landscaping, sod where a large tree came down, a new ornamental tree, new beds with large privacy bushes/trees, irrigation adjustments and a beautiful stacked stone border across the front and side of the house and around two oaks out front.  We had worked with Pam on a stone patio a few years ago, so we knew how talented, knowledgeable and responsive she is.  We wanted established, healthy plants and we couldn’t be happier with the finished product.  We had an absolutely wonderful crew and we highly recommend them for your next project.  Jason and his team, Russell and Andrea, were all extremely hardworking, personable and a joy to work with.  Excellent work ethic and very dependable!  Great communication to make sure we were happy every step of the way.  Thanks for a job well done.  Suzanne & Steve Foster

name: V Gallaspy
text: We have used Sexton Lawn & Landscaping on previous landscaping projects & have always been extremely happy with the results.  Pam is always great about listening to what you want and making suggestions where they are needed. We recently had to redo a section of our yard due to storm damage. The finished product turned out better than we imagined. Pam did a great job of laying out the design and Chad, Cesar and Matthew always showed up on time and worked hard. They are excellent at being able to follow the plan and make changes that will best suit the layout of the landscape and the customers desires.  Their personalities are so delightful that I almost hate to see the project come to an end. Also, I would be remiss if I didn’t mention the irrigation specialists, Tyler & Murray.  Great guys that really know their stuff.  I have had numerous problems with my irrigation system partly due to original installation (not done by Sexton) and living on a slope. Tyler has come to my rescue on many occasions. He always shows up and shows out (on time and efficient, with a good attitude). Thanks so much for another job well done!!

name: Vicky Kobelja
text: Sexton is a first class company to work with. I needed my abysmal backyard to become a wonderful place to spend time in. I presented my dreams and desires to the landscape designer, April. (Winding walkways, points of interest and places to rest.). She presented me with the perfect design. Chad, Matthew and Caesar came to my home and turned her design into a wonderful oasis of winding walkways, restful paved sitting areas and beautifully planted beds. These are the most skilled and easy to work with professionals I have encountered. This amazing project was perfectly executed in their estimated time frame. My husband and I couldn’t be happier with the results.

name: tjb98
text: Sexton recently completed a large landscaping project for us and we're very happy with the results.  We worked with Pam on the design and once that was finished,  the work was scheduled and completed without issue.  We even had some unexpected tree problems come up before the job started which created last minute design changes which were taken care of.  Jason and his crew did a great job.  Everyone was very friendly and communication was great.

name: Nancy Rogers
text: This business is very unreliable! For two solid weeks I have been put off by this company after making several calls to verify an appointment scheduled for today, March 17, 2021. I called several times because I was told that I would receive a confirmation email following my first call, for which the email has yet to come. I called in yet again this morning for verification and was told the person scheduled to come to my home canceled today. Had I not called in, I would have still been expecting someone to come to my home!!!! Please Do  NOT be fooled by this business!! They sound professional over the phone, but they do not keep their word! This speaks volumes about what could and WILL happen once they get your business.

resp.text: We apologize for the appointment confusion.  We try our best to accommodate each and every person that calls us for an appointment and unfortunately we got your appointment mixed up.  This is not a typical representation of how we run our business. Thank you for your candid feedback.

name: Janet Norman
text: I have used Sexton for lawn maintenance for years.  Recently I used them for lighting the front of my house.  I was so happy with the results (thanks Tyler).  When I was ready to install a fire pit and walkways out back I didn’t call anybody else.  Pam Pace was the designer and she knew exactly what my backyard needed.  She recommended the right materials, dimensions, and even asked the crew to come look at her plans before quoting me to make sure she thought of every contingency.  That same crew came to build the project.  The only delays were due to weather.  Chad always kept me informed of the schedule and progress and I got to know his team too - Cesar and Matt.  All professional, polite, courteous and experts at their work.  When Chad suggested additional lighting, Pam had me a quote and lights ordered within the hour.  Everyone did a great job working around my dogs too.  Thank you to all!

name: Rodger French
text: Absolutely first-class professionals. Pam did a great job helping us plan the landscaping for our front yard, and the crew consisting of Chad, Caesar, and Matthew brought it all together beautifully. They could not have been easier to work with and we are thrilled with the results. Kudos and the highest recommendation to all.

name: Ms Weeks
text: The crew did a nice job cleaning, clearing, and shaping a very overgrown yard with numerous bushes and hedges.  The crew was hard working and eager to please. The irrigation system repair work we had done in the past was also handled efficiently and professionally.

name: Daneve Neal
text: Sexton completed a landscaping project to surround a brand new pool installation.  The entire team was quite communicative and professional. I could not have been more pleased with not only the result, but the entire project was a delight   Chad our project foreman was on site all day and kept us up to date each evening with what was done and what we could expect the next day. There were absolutely no surprises nor loose ends. That was not the case with the pool company, so it just made this team shine all the more. Our project planner, Pam , listened to what we wanted and concerns and drew up a design that fit our budget and met our expectations.  We have worked with this company on several projects over the years and that in itself should say a lot. Let me not for get to mention that Matthew and Cesar were also important integral members of our team and very much appreciated.  I think they should all get a bonus (Sorry Sid)

name: Carol T Dean
text:
All new homeowners and those needing a “re-do” after many years, call Pam Pace at Sexton Lawn & Landscaping ASAP! She and our landscaper, Brock, were very kind, professional, and followed up after the job was completed to make sure we were satisfied with the work they had done.
Pam was also knowledgeable about the types of plants that grow well in this region, taking into account your needs for aesthetic beauty, maintenance-free or low maintenance, and susceptibility to fungi, insects, etc.
Now we have a beautiful yard from all sides and one that we can enjoy for many years as retirees!

name: Ingrid Emminger
text:
You could not ask for the quality of the plants these men installed.  The value was great.  The two men,  Chris and his partner should be commended for their professionalism.  These are the kind of people everyone wants.  The two days they worked they did not sit still.  Never saw them sit around doing nothing.    Very responsive and answered all questions we asked about the plantings and care.  They were here when they advised us to their arrival time.  They are advised when they were leaving.

These were two fellows I would want to have return anytime  As far as their employment I would hire THEM anytime.  Great employees!  They should be complimented for their work ethics.  Thank you guys!

name: Ron Starkey
text:
I saw a stone walkway on their website and said I need something like that for my back yard. Pam Pace
promptly came out for an estimate. Chad and his crew Cesar and Matthew did an outstanding job. You couldn’t even tell we had any recent work done when they finished. It looked like it was there for years.

name: Eric Arnold
text:
I am very impressed with the services for irrigation systems provided by Sexton Landscape. Tyler was extremely courteous and knowledgeable when troubleshooting and repairing my irrigation system. I would absolutely endorse Sexton for landscape services because of this positive experience.

My second experience with Sexton Landscape was also very impressive. Chris and crew did some drain work for me that was laid out by Murray. The team was efficient, respectful and knew their task. Great experience.

name: stephen bodnar
text: Kevin A. did a great job in cleaning up the Hurricane Sally debris in my yard.  Very professional, prompt and knowledgeable.  I highly recommend Kevin A.

name: Ashley Baker
text: I had a tree down on Monday as a result of Tropical Storm Cristobal.  I called Sexton Landscapes, my monthly yard maintenance service, and asked if it could help.  Amber sent Chris and Ben THAT DAY and those two had the whole tree chainsawed, cleaned up and out of the way very quickly, including the stump!  They were friendly, hardworking and professional.  I so appreciated the quick response and handling of my isuue.  I highly recommend Sexton Landscapes and Chris and Ben.

name: sharon lavender
text: Sexton just completed a landscape around the pool. I absolutely love it! Pam captured my vision as always and designed a beautiful space. Chad and crew were great to work with and did an awesome job.  This is the third project I have used them for and have not been disappointed. Look forward to the next.

name: Sharon Rosson
text: We are so pleased with our new landscape design by April.  Chris did an amazing job bringing April's design to reality with professionalism and personalized service that I feel is not seen often.  To say that he wanted to make sure that we were happy with the final product is an understatement!    Our house looks amazing!  We love it!

name: Peggy Domning
text: Very happy with our experience with Sexton Landscaping.  Brock, Ben, and Murray went out of their way to make sure we were happy with everything, and we are.  Our yard looks so much better!

name: Lisa Sibal
text: Working with Sexton has been a great experience for us. We began with them four years ago, when they developed a plan to literally pull out our prior "landscaping" (which was just a mess of weeds) and completely re-do the entire lot (which is 50 x 300 feet). Their staff is excellent and highly knowledgeable. Also, they are extremely responsive-when we did have an issue with the lawn or a planting, they sent someone out immediately to remedy it. I would definitely use them again.

name: Jim MacMicking
text: Unable to maintain a schedule for staff or even keep an appointment.  As a potential new customer, my appointment was cancelled because the representative was no longer available.  I had changed my business calendar to accommodate theirs and they cancelled our meeting.  If this is how a potential customer is treated, what's it like if you are a customer?

name: Wihebrink Landscape Management, Inc.
text: I have known Sid Sexton for over a decade through a professional organization that we both belong to as landscape contractors.  Sid is a very professional business owner that concentrates on the development of his team and staff while providing the highest quality services.  Sid work tirelessly on his business to constantly achieve desired results.  It's been a pleasure watching his business grow from just a few people into the organization of today.  As a landscape business owner, I would recommend Sexton Lawn & Landscape if you have a high value standard.

resp.text: 😢 got us in the feels right there.

name: Ed Davidson
text: Our yard looked like a bomb had gone gone off after hurricane Sally.  Two oaks down, sagging fence, turf and irrigation system destroyed from uprooted trees and the heavy machinery required to remove them.  Tim Sansom did an outstanding job of helping plan the repairs and enhancements.  We misfired on a couple of the items and he patiently worked with us to fix.  The men who did the actual work were excellent.  Brock and Adalid worked for three days to repair the damage and install new shrubs and trees.  This is a good company who you can trust to do the right thing.

resp.text: Mr. Davidson, thank you so much for this review. It has been a pleasure serving you throughout the years.

name: tim ogletree
text: We recently had a landscape makeover by Sexton. The service was excellent from the design process to the last day of the install. Pam, Murray , and Chris were great to work with and their combined knowledge made the entire process headache free. And the end product looks great. Highly recommend Sexton Lawn and Landscape.

name: tyler krob
text: Outstanding customer focused company, I'd recommend them to anyone!

name: Linda Larson
text: Jamal and his crew has taken care of our Cottage Community for the last 7 years.  Jamal is always ready to serve and take care of anything you bring to his attention right then and there.  He takes pride in his work and is very conscientious  that the property looks good.  He gives great customer service and is compassionate.  We know that our property will always be well cared for when Jamal is on the job!

name: Tim Nevitt
text: Chris Brock ,Ada lid  did my flower bed and installed new Sod on our front yard they where very professional and very helpful and informative. Very nice to address our questions also . I would recommend them and Sexton for any of your landscape or lawn care needs

name: Michael Johns
text: We've used Sexton Lawn & Landscape for several projects including french drains, WiFi irrigation controller, additional irrigation zones, sod removal and re-sodding, etc.  They're always professional, respectful, knowledgeable and perform high quality work.  Some of the outstanding team members which has worked on our projects have been Brock, Ben, Kayden, Tyler, Ezra, Chris and I'm sure that I am leaving out some names.  Additionally, we've had the pleasure of meeting Tim and Murray during estimate and work reviews.  They are always easy to contact and respond to questions and concerns quickly and accurately.  I highly recommend Sexton for any lawn and landscaping, you won't be disappointed.  We plan to contract them for any future work.

resp.text: Wow! What an amazing review! Thank you so much for your business and the kind words.

name: Kathy McGuire
text: Very professional and conscientious about existing landscaping. Added design and hardware for us.

name: Shaelah Williams
text: I can’t say enough good things about this company! Roberto and his crew are always so attentive, they’re great at communicating, always jubilant and always professional. When I bring issues to his attention, he is quick to take care of them. I can always rely on things to get done and for our communities best interest to be had. Our community looks amazing because of them!

resp.text: That is fantastic to hear. We LOVE Roberto and are so glad you do to. We will definitely pass this along to Roberto and his crew.

name: Terry Worley
text: Professional,Clean,Kind, and adaptive our words I us to describe the quality work and service I get each week with Sexton.I had Matt,Chris,and Joey Come today and really give my Facility the look it needs and being a nursing home having a company that will work with you, by keeping in compliance with new guild lines laid out by the CDC and CMS is amazing. They truly go above and beyond in everything they do. If you need the best GIve Mike a Call.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the kind words. It is a pleasure serving you and we are so glad we could make you happy!

name: Cindy Fowlkes
text: Today I had some warranty work done by Chris Nelson, Brock and Adalidi. They replaced some plants with care, kindness and professionalism.  Thank you guys for doing such a good job!

name: Greg Higgins
text:
We've had a great experience from the site evaluation through the finished job. Tyler, Tim and Robin are very knowledgeable and professional. Austin and his crew took great care getting in, doing the work and making sure everything was cleaned when they were done.

These guys and gals aren't fly by nights working with just rakes and shovels out of the back of their truck. They are also reasonably priced.

resp.text: Mr. Higgins, thank you very much for the business and the excellent review. We appreciate both very much!

name: eugene harper
text:
I heard about Sexton on the radio and I started using them for spraying my lawn. After our pool was done we contacted them again and Pam worked with mine and my wife’s work schedule to meet with us. She showed up at our house after work one night completely prepared with the design we asked for and print outs of all the plants so we understood what we were getting. We signed on with Sexton.
A week later Murray, Chris, Austin, and Adalid showed up bright and early. All we a delight to have around courteous and respectful. They all did a great job. And showed genuine concern for any question we had. I would recommend this company hand down to anyone.

name: Janette Stone
text: We had a landscape project done by Sexton Lawn & Landscape, Inc. recently.  This company was excellent to work with - hands down!  Pam, Chad, Freddie and Cesar were nothing but professional.  Pam suggested outdoor lighting after the project was completed.  So glad we took her recommendation.  We have received so many compliments.  They also repaired our sprinkler system.  We would highly recommend this company!  If you want a smooth project and every call/email/text returned - call Sexton!  We had such a great experience that they are handling the maintenance for our yard now.  Janette Stone

name: Bobby Presley
text: Just had completed an excellent landscaping job from Sexton Lawn & Landscaping.  The team, led by Caleb, and included Alex and Donnie were very professional, courteous, customer oriented and detailed in accomplishing what the project called for, but more importantly providing the customer with the product they were looking for. I highly recommend Caleb and his team for any landscaping project a homeowner may have in the future.  I know that we will have another project after the first of the new year and we will request Caleb and his team to be the team that completes that project.  A group of hardworking guys that have a goal of total customer satisfaction.

name: Dawn Bush
text: Great workers! Chris Nelson, Brock and Adalidi did a great job resoodding a portion of our front lawn. They were timely, efficient, pleasant and helpful. Thanks guys!

name: Becky Beck
text: We highly recommend Sexton's!  I never liked the builders package of landscaping that came with our house in 2007.  It had too many Indian Hawthornes and holly trees.  We built a pool in 2017 and consulted with Pam about landscaping then.  We decided that we thought we could handle it on our own.  Wrong, we could not.  This year our front flower beds were becoming overrun by a horrible torpedo grass.  We decided to contact Pam again.  She was wonderful in coming up with a plan for handling all our concerns.  Sexton was able to schedule our landscaping in a very timely manner.  The project manager, Austin, and his crew where very professional and efficient. Austin went above and beyond to make sure we were satisfied.  The woodwork build by Mike is exceptional.  Pam's customer service and follow up is outstanding.  We love our yard now!  Thank you Sexton's!

resp.text: Mrs. Beck, thank you so much for the review, kind words and your business. It has been a pleasure serving you!

name: James Helm
text: It was with some trepidation that we approached a makeover of our yard, but were soon put at ease by Tim's ability to listen to our needs and to suggest an approach that merged almost perfectly with what we had in mind. With Jim's oversight and  Chad, Freddie and Cesaer functioning like the proverbial "well oiled machine", our project was accomplished in seemingly no time. Attention to detail, hard work and the ability to listen to the customer were much appreciated ! The final result exceeded our expectations, and the entire team definitely went above and beyond ! Well done Sexton !

name: Kendra Tobey
text:
Wow! I would highly recommend Sexton to everyone, and I do not say that often. From the first meeting with Pam Pace to the final walk through with Chad and Freddie, I could not be more impressed with the quality of service I received.
Pam arrived, was so easy to talk with, and talked about the problems such as drainage. She asked about the style of garden, what plants I liked and disliked and budget. The second meeting, I saw the design. WOW! She nailed it! Easy to care for, low maintenance, colorful (not only the flowers but the shrubs, too)and well spaced (so many places want to sell you too many plants so it will look good now but will be a jungle later).
From the moment, Chad and Freddie showed up, it was right to work! We discuss the lay out, drainage problems and answered every question I had. These two guys are some of the hardest working and best natured guys I have ever met! ( AND again, I do not say that often) They kept me informed with every part of the process, what they were doing and why they were doing it. They went way above the call of duty! They ,also, took alot of pride in their work, which is rare these days.
And Jim, he showed up to scope out the job and returned towards the end of job to make sure the job was up to Sexton's standards.
Everyone ended their conversations with me by saying "If you have any questions or problems, just call" and I have.
From the quality of service to the quality of plants I received from Sexton, it has been 5 stars all the way!

name: naketa randolph
text: I am a student at Coastal Alabama Community College in Thomasville. The campus always looks great! The lawns stay cut and trees trimmed back. They do a WONDERFUL job. Thank you guys for all your hard work.

name: Robert Browning
text: I've never seen two men work as hard as Caleb and Donnie! They took the renderings from Tim and did a fine job on our lawn.  We are very pleased.  We are repeat customers and look forward to having Sexton Lawn and Landscape maintain our lawn throughout the coming year.  We highly recommend them.

resp.text: Mr. Browning, thank you so much for those kind words as well as your business. We appreciate you very much!

name: Marcy Blanshan
text: Very knowledgeable, professional and NICE!  We have worked with Sexton on several projects and have loved the experience every time.  Tim is a wonderful landscape designer!  No better group than Austin, Chris and Adalid to make the design come to life!  Highly recommend working with this crew!

name: Kevin Wood
text: Pam, Austin, Adalid, and Chris did such a wonderful job on installing my irrigation system, drawing out my landscaping plans, and getting my yard looking great. They were professional and did everything that they said they were going to do in a timely manner. Great Job!

resp.text: Thank you so much!

name: Fonda Gantt
text: Everyone we dealt with at Sexton were helpful, friendly, and listened. This company totally redid our beds in front of the house. Pam, Austin, Chris, and Adalid were all involved. We love what they did as well as their attitude, punctuality, professionalism. We highly recommend them.

resp.text: Mrs. Gantt, Thank you so much for the kind words as well as your business! It is so nice to hear this about our team. We will certainly pass this message along to the crew!

name: Brad Summersell
text: Very impressed and pleased with pavered walk paths and landscaping work Sexton completed for us in February. From the very start working with Pam on initial ideas to Chad’s team with Cesar & Freddie executing and adjusting to unforeseen circumstances I cannot say enough about the quality of their work and professionalism.

resp.text: Thank you so much. It has been a real pleasure working with you and Perry!

name: Curtis Houston
text: This review is about the irrigation work I received a few weeks ago by Tyler Krob... I can't say enough good things about Tyler. He tracked down an odd system of irrigation by the previous owners and installed a few new heads, tweaked everything and then went over it all. I was blown away by Tyler's knowledge and professionalism. He went over my entire system, helped me get it all dialed in and explained what each head did and how each spray/rotor worked and how to adjust them. He was very knowledgeable on how much water was needed during each season and set the system up before he left. I couldn't be happier with the work I received. Thank you.

name: Donald Wilson
text: I had some landscaping did today and Austin and his crew knocked it out of the park! the customer service was top and they went above to make sure I was completely happy before leaving! Pam Pace recommendations as always were point on...Pam is always such a pleasure to work with and great ideas.. Thank you Pam and Austin!

name: Julie D.
text: Sexton did a complete landscape of our side yard. The job involved grading, replacing the soil, a walk path, irrigation, drainage, lighting, plant beds with all new plants, and a raised decorative bed. The process was perfectly smooth. Every detail in the communication, planning, design, process, and completion, was outstanding. Pam listened carefully to our goals and tastes. She brought a plan that needed very little adjusting. Chad and Freddie completed the job in remarkable time. They communicated well and brought to our attention anything that we needed to be aware and made excellent suggestions about every detail including things we would not have thought about. Immediately upon completion of the work, professional staff met us to inspect and plan follow up over the next few weeks to monitor plant health. We selected Sexton because we use them to treat our front yard sod. It is healthy and weed free even when nearby yards struggle with weed control. One of the prettiest yards in the neighborhood was designed and is maintained by Sexton. Their work speaks for itself. We wish other businesses in our area would consult with Sexton to learn their business practices and processes.

name: David Davison
text:
Sexton Team does a exceptional job in all aspects.  The people are professional and very nice at all times.   I believe it comes  from Sid Saxton, the customer comes first.
My yard team is lead by Jamal whom is always ready to do his job and please.
Pam Pace did some landscape design work and Robyn & Jason take care of fertilize and weed control.
Everyone is a real asset to the company.

name: William Morgan
text: I had Sexton Lawn and Landscape design and put in a new look to my yard last summer. They have been wonderful in helping me keep it up as well as making suggestions on to improve my maintenance of it .  They are an excellent landscape company. I would highly recommend them to anyone who would like to turn a drab old yard into something to be proud of. Thanks to the staff as well as the various crews that have helped in that endeavor.

name: Darlene Sirmon
text: Sexton Landscapes landscaped my backyard and it is beautiful. The team of Chad, Freddie and Ceasr are fantastic. They were Punctual, professional and considerate and very knowledgeable. The lighting is perfect hi lighting trees anc walk they installed. Thank you Pam for the lovely design.

name: Kathryn Smith
text: I have been working with Sexton for seven months to revitalize my backyard.  Services have included irrigation, french drains, and landscaping. Sexton was attentive to my concerns and goals and helped me to develop a beautiful, low maintenance haven. Project days have been executed proficiently with attention to detail. There has been on going follow along. I used to avoid my backyard. It is now my go to happy place! When I am ready for my next project, you know who I am going to call!

resp.text: Mrs. Smith, thank you so so much for your kind word and the trust you have placed in us. It is a pleasure serving you!

name: Mint Decor
text: After attempting to hire three landscape companies, I finally found one that showed up and did the job to perfection! Pam was my landscape designer and when she presented the plans, I said:  "You actually nailed it!  You've included everything I asked for:  boulders, lighting and color."  Chad and Freddy were my guys for removal and installation and bringing Pam's design to life.  Communication was fantastic and their work ethic was exceptional.  I cannot imagine doing their job in the summer heat of Alabama but they did not stop.  They shared my excitement when I got home to see the finished project and stayed late to make sure every detail was done to perfection.   THANK YOU SEXTON, PAM, CHAD AND FREDDY

resp.text: Thank you so much for this wonderful review. We all appreciate it very much! And it looks like we owe Chad and Freddy some Ice Cream:-) Thank you again.

name: John Marron
text: Chris, Adilad, and Alex did a fantastic job re-sodding my lawn as well as extending my irrigation system. Very punctual and courteous. Will use again.

name: Gail Linkins
text: Christopher Nelson, Adalidi Hernandez and Jordan Lundy just completed a job at our home to address a water issue.  They updated the dry rock bed and put in a drainage system to move water down our sloped yard. Some soil and sod and they were done.  They stayed in touch during the project and were very polite.  Our yard looks great.  Thank you!

name: Jack Daily
text:
As President of Equality Condo Owners along with the other owners have been on a mission to solve a multi-facet problem. That mission ended today in the completion of a landscape project by the Sexton Landscaping by the  boots on the ground landscaping, team of Chris and Adalid.

The project solved the functional problems of poor drainage and people parking on our lawn (next to the no-parking sign). But an equally satisfying aspect of the project was the huge impact aesthetically. The installation of multi-colored, multi-sized river bed rock stretching across our lawn from culvert to culvert turned our property from an eye-sore into a renaissance painting.

But don't believe me. Drive by our condo at the corner of Equality Avenue and School Street, two blocks from the downtown Fairhope to see for yourself. Enjoy the view!

Also I would like to thank the upfront team of Jamie, Tim and Murray who orchestrated the design and executed the process flawlessly..

Thank you Sexton!

name: Tracey Weaver
text: We are so impressed with our new Pergola Sexton Lawn and Landscape built in our back yard.  We called them and Pam came out immediately and created the perfect sketch of what we had dreamed of !! Mike built a beautiful pergola complete with electricity and ceiling fan !! Chris and his crew poured the cement and the color was perfect ! The final touches were to add flagstone steps and Jim did an amazing job. We couldn't be happier with our "New"back yard.

name: Gregory Dunn
text: What a pleasure to have had the work team of Chad Mason, Freddie Bonilla and Ceasar assigned to my project.  The were obviously very knowledgeable, personable and went out of their way to ensure that the work was done in a professional manner.  I was impressed at the level and thoroughness of the work which went beyond what I had expected.  They took the time to explain the process and assisted me in my follow-up work.  I would not hesitate to use Sexton again and if this team is representative of the quality and customer focus of the other Sexton personnel then anybody who chooses to utilize them should have the same experience.

name: Ashley Isbell
text: I have attended classes on both the Thomasville and Monroeville campus and they both always look great. I’ve often seen the guys out working very hard to keep the campuses neat and clean and they are always so nice and respectful. Alex is doing a wonderful job on both campuses! Keep up the great work guys!

name: Debra Harper
text: Pam drew a beautiful landscape for us picking  all of the plants and design we needed. Chris, Austin , and Adalid did a beautiful job installing everything.  We definitely will use them again !

name: MBZ
text: Having a great experience with Sexton in 2017, we invited them to return and add to our landscape.  As before, they did a great job, were timely and again, wonderful to work with.  From Justin and Tim to the guys who beautified our yard...Austin, Chris and Adalid...everyone was very customer focused and professional.  And BTW, their prices are very competitive.  You won't be sorry if you give them a try!

resp.text: Thank you so much for your business and the review.

name: Katheryn Scott
text: In February, Pam Pace, along with Austin and his team did an awesome job of redoing my front flower bed. In May I called Pam Pace back to help design a patio and bed for my backyard. Chad Mason and his team completed the task this last week. My new tree and azalea bed, and paver patio and pergola expanded my former 2 seater patio into a comfortable size and I love it.

resp.text: Thank you so much for taking the time to give us a review. We appreciate it very much.

name: Jim Divers
text:
They have been doing work on our yard for several years. Just had
beds in front re-done. After working with Pam Pace to design we had Chad and Freddie for the work of installing. They were both great and we are very happy with their work!

Jim Divers , Fairhope.

name: Susan Shull
text: We have been working with Sexton Lawn and Landscaping for about 1 year.  They have helped us with our irrigation system and getting it working properly.  Also have done soil analysis and treatments to get our lawn looking much better.  We have worked with Justin in landscaping for getting us an updated look and really love what he has proposed and initiated.  Definitely a full service and professional company!!

name: Greg Carley
text:
Austin, Chris, and Adalid did an awesome jobs with my four trees!!
They were very polite and knowledgeable.
I am looking forward to working with them in the future.

name: Janet English
text: I have used Sexton on and off for years and they always strive to do a top-notch job. Austin, Chris & Adalid just installed two trees today and they let me take the time to get them right where I wanted them. Very professional crew.

name: David Jones
text:
I have tried several individuals/companies to assist me in servicing my lawn but have been very disappointed.  I decided to use Sexton Lawn & Landscape.  The responsiveness and feedback thus far has been superb. Tim Sansom responded immediately to my inquiries and was always available for meet with me.  I was especially please with Tyler Krob, Irrigation Technician,  that immediately solved my front lawn sprinkler problem.  Several other companies failed miserably in the past.  He was timely, informative and effective.  Employees like Tyler are hard to find!
David S. Jones
LTC (R)

name: Tiffany Jeanine
text: Does a beautiful job with landscaping. I would definitely recommend for home, small businesses, big businesses....they are simply awesome! 😁

name: tony cordell
text: Just finished putting our back yard together after our pool was installed. Great guys and did an awesome job. Very pleased. Thanks.

name: Trinity LaGreca
text: Love Love Love Sexton Landscaping!!! Alex and his crew do a wonderful job keeping our apartment community looking beautiful as ever! They are easy to work with, great at communicating, quick and efficient. Thank you for all you and your team do for us Alex!

resp.text: Thank you so much for those kind words.

name: Harriet Outlaw
text: We are extremely pleased with Sexton. Jamal is a godsend. He has turned our country yard into a country estate! Thank you!

name: James Owen
text: Great experience!  Completed the job earlier than expected & did a quality job.  Donnie & his crew were neat, professional, courteous, timely, etc. We are very pleased !!

name: Norris Emily
text: Sam is great! He always gets in touch with me to let me know when he's going to my house.  I'm picky about my dog and kids getting in the yard too soon after its sprayed, so he makes it a point to make sure I know. So nice to trust people to go to your house when your not there. The ladies in the office that manage my contract are also extremely patient (I went back and forth multiple times about what services I wanted) and very nice. Overall great service.

resp.text: Thank you so very much for the kind words and review. We all work very hard to serve our customers well and its nice to hear about it when we get it right. We will certainly pass this along to Sam. He's pretty much a Rock Star on our team! I know you have several choices in our area for landscape companies so we appreciate the fact that you have chosen to do business with us. Thank you very much!

name: Bruce Streeter
text:
Had an irrigation system put in and cannot thank Caleb and Donnie enough. Great job although under difficult circumstances. Any issues were immediately remedied and cared for by Dalton. Great teamwork!!
Highly recommended.

Don't know what a individual, that I don't know or have ever seen, can say that I don't fit the criteria for what they are wanting to hire an put to work. Truly received a BAD taste in my mouth and a bad 👎 way to get done,  like this, is the work only a good experienced person who has been working in this field of work for nearly three years of doing everything that's going to be needed to get done in a way that is the safest, easiest, cheapest, most new  jobs in this type of work is being quick and easy to use the equipment and having a satisfied customers that says good things about the way you are working and the way you can get a job completed in the least bit of time that's called for on completion of that job. Sexton Lawn and Irrigation, you lost your chance to get a great man that is experienced in all the content that is called for in doing the BEST job an completely finishing up all the tasks that are given, an don't waste time or money thinking about how to get a job completed. This is the worst decision that your company could have ever imagined to make, just a few things that I've been doing, doesn't mean that I am not trying to get a chance to better my way to live and be able to do it for the rest of my life that is a good feeling that I am a saved man and has been forgiven for my past ways to live by the best God, that is a father who has given me his grace and forgave me. Sorry for not being able to be a part of your company, but I'm a happy with the way things are going to be in the future of my life, God is good,all the time!!

Mr. Flannigan,

name: Jesse Carbullido
text: Called and made an appointment for some cleanup and removal of planter boxes. I also asked for a quote for weekly lawn maintenance. They never quoted me after the rep came out to our home. Said they would email me 2weeks ago. I suspect my money is no good here so I’m wondering why? Seems to me they pick and choose instead of putting service as a number one priority. For that reason I do not recommend this company.

resp.text: Mr. Carbullido, now that you have made this public, let's address your concern. First, our sales representative reported witnessing an apparent drug deal in your driveway upon arrival.  You then proceeded to curse our representative out accusing him of being law enforcement.  We felt is was in our best interest NOT to proceed in doing business with you. We intended on keeping this between us but since you brought this up, we are happy to let everyone know why we are choosing not to do business with you.  If you would like to carry this further, we are happy to contact law enforcement directly. We trust the public, our future clientele, and our existing clientele to agree with our judgement.

name: Robby Clark
text:
ABSOLUTELY the worst company out there.  I had a young lady come through our neighborhood and ask if I would like a free estimate on servicing my yard.  I told her yes and within a few days I had a phone call with my estimate. Everything started good with speaking with both employees.  The SALESPERSON (Gail) told me I would get 5 different applications over the year. I told her I had a previous lawn company (which Ill be returning too) and they have done most treatments.  She told me to find out when they were last out and call back.  I didn't call Weed Man back before they came out so they decided to go ahead and do two applications on my yard when I did not approve  both applications. We paid $40 and a couple of days later had another invoice in the mail.  I called them to ask why I had another invoice and they told me they did two applications, even though I didn't give them authorization to do it.  The playing manager (DAVID) said that I said Yes when I didn't, so he proceeded to tell me he was going to go and pull the recording of the original phone call.  He called back told me that I never said yes to the weed killer application but  that I was supposed to call them back. Because I didn't they went ahead anyways and charged me for it.

They will do anything they can to get money.  There are videos on Youtube showing they are scamming people and all the franchises are taught to do the same and that is to screw the customers.  If you would like to try them just beware.  You will not get anything good out of it.

name: Ryan Reid
text: Excellent customer service!

name: Stacey Hurst
text: I haven't used them.  I like to cut my grass myself.  I have lived in my house for three years now and I've had to deal with them pretty much harrassing me.  Calling me all the time.  I've blocked their number but they always find a way to call back.  And they always come to my house  offering estimates.  Ive been politely telling them for years that I like to things for myself.  It's like they don't get the point.  Today I finally told them not to call me anymore or come to my house anymore.  It's borderline stalking.  They have been harrassing me for business for way too long.  I wasn't trying to be rude I just got tired of them.

name: Jeffrey Wydner
text: I have been an Ecopest customer since September of 2019. I rarely ever give reviews but my experience with Ecopest has been so positive that I wanted to share with others. The company has proven to be honest, thorough, and professional on all aspects. They have not tried to sell me packages I do not need as many pest control companies do. They are small enough to make the relationship personal yet big enough to handle the job. I highly recommend Ecopest to anyone needing pest control.

name: Sherri Mann
text: I first learned of Ecopest through Groupon.  They were very nice and happy to treat our home and yard for the first few visits.  I had concerns about lack of communication and technicians not showing up on time, but was not convinced that services should be suspended until the last visit in March 2020 when the check I gave the tech for payment was "lost."  We waited several weeks to see if they could find the missing check before paying by credit card.  We asked them to cancel all services at that point.  Two months later, Ecopest cashed the missing check without contacting us at all.  We called and left messages but our calls were not returned.  I emailed them and asked for a $75 refund.  I got a response the next day that said that Michael would process a refund check shortly.  They never bothered to call or apologize for their mistake or try to explain their actions. I would not recommend this company.

name: Michelle Stinnett
text: As a realtor, it's great to have a company you can work with that understands our needs.  Dustin is great.  The company is affordable and very knowledgeable.  I love working with Stephanie when I need to call and get info.  She's very helpful!

resp.text: Thank you

name: Shawn Masters
text:
This review is strictly about the lawn care side of the business. This company is not dependable, they make all kinds of excuses and they do AWFUL work. Charge a hefty amount ($50.00) to cut and ($35.00) to treat and I have a very small yard as I have a large in-ground pool that takes up most of my back yard. My grass looked the worst, this year, it has ever looked and they broke an electrical box on my pool and then tried to make it out to be my fault. If you want to have a good-looking lawn look elsewhere.

***Update 5 Jan 2020***

Received a phone call on 4 Jan from one of the owners (Dusty, he managers the pest control). He wanted to see what he could do to make up for the awful service that I received from the lawn care part of his business. I told him there really was nothing he could do as I am not one to write a review just to get a discount. He was very nice and offered to refund part of my money but I told him that he did not need to do that. He was concerned about my review being one star as it really hurts the other side of his business as they are tied together. I told him i understood and that I hated for that to happen so I have now raised it to a three-star rating. I cannot speak for his side of the business so it is unfair for me to give the entire business a one star because of the lawn care side. So, with all that said I still do not recommend the lawn care part of this business or at least not until Dusty gets rid of his partner whoever he is. Thanks for reaching out Dusty it really speaks volumes about your business ethic.

resp.text: Shawn, I will be reaching out to you to see what needs to be done to make this right.  It is our goal to always do the right thing when it come to how we treat people.  I know mistakes happen sometimes.  It important that when they do, we take ownership of it.  I apologise for not achieving and exceededing your expectations.  I will call you soon.

text: Completely blown away by the customer service that Ecopest offers. Went above and beyond for us. We will be using them for all of our future pest control needs and will be dropping Cooks. First rate service. Great pricing. Very very impressed!!!!

name: Lynn Smith
text: Beware!!! Horrible company. They sold us on their good reviews but their service is hardly top notch. From day one they were not able to get our account right. We were being charged for services that we did not sign up for and were not preformed. Had to call every quarter when our bill was due because it was always incorrect and instead of fixing the issue all we got were excuses then Dustin would try to sell me additional services that we did not need nor want. We were being charged late fees when our account clearly showed  no balance due. Save yourself time and money - there are too many pest control companies out there so don’t settle for less here.

resp.text: Lynn I'm sorry you had a bad experience.  I tried looking up your account to contact you, but we do not have one listed under this name.  It sounds like a clerical issue.  Should be easily fixable.  I would love the opportunity to make this right.  Please call 2562741716 on Monday, we open at 9am.  I will make sure it gets fixed.

name: Julie W
text: I was in need of a true crawl space analysis after having a large amount of water (35000 gallons) dump into the crawl space after a pipe break.  First I called one of the crawl space companies.  Issue with them is that they actually don't care about anything except making sure you get a quote for about 4000 to 8000 dollars in water proofing nor will they give you a report with the details of the moisture readings.  My agent called Ecopest and Dustin came out to do an inspection.  He did moisture readings throughout the crawl space and recommended a series of steps to return the crawl space back to its usual condition.  He explained everything in simple terms and I learned a lot from him.  When the work that needs to be done isn't something they do he recommends highly capable people with the same integrity as those that work at Ecopest.  This job ended up costing $4000 LESS than the supposed crawl space experts and now my crawl space is back in its original condition with no waterproofing solution necessary.  Thank you Dustin!  You are a lifesaver!

resp.text: It is our pleasure to serve.  Thank you for the kind words.

text:

Update: The owner contacted me and and explained that they were swamped with work and was very eager to make things right. So even though things didn't work out this time I would definitely call them again if I needed some landscaping or irrigation work done.

text: I called Friday May 24th to find out when our lawn was going to be serviced. The owner's wife Traci said she just stepped away to run some errands and she would call me back. I told her our yard looks horrible since it has not been cut since May 2nd and I know when they are there because of the camera. I then asked when they were going to be coming out and she said the earliest would be this Wednesday, since they were done for whichthe week. That  would have made it nearly a month which is totally unexceptable. She then told me that they have long standing customers that have to be taken care of and I responded I am a paying customer as well and she said all their customers need to be taken care of. The owner sent me a message Saturday stating the entire yard would be taken care of Tuesday. It is sad when you pay someone to do a job and it is half done or not at all. Pretty much after each time they cut our lawn I would have to call because they didn't weed eat the fence line or cut the easement as agreed upon. I will not ever recommend them or use them again. If there was a way to add the pictures I took today of my lawn I would so do it. Horrible business!!😠

Very refreshing to deal with a honest , capable businessman.
I texted Marcus and within a hour he replied, made arrangements to come for a free estimate and when he said he would get here at 6:30. He was here as promised.    He’s a man of his word, he will give you exceptional services at extremely reasonable prices.  Let me just tell ya there’s only one fantastic landscaper and it’s Mitchum.    Don’t waste calling anyone else cause your not gonna get any better than this.   I’m a new, happy, and lifetime customer.
Thanks again to Marcus and your team, you guys are the best!  Keep up the great work 👍

Mr Smith I'm so sorry I am just now seeing this! Sir it was a real pleasure dealing with you on our first quarterly cleanup back in January. It was awesome talking to you and learning about the house you built yourself. You paid quick, didn't argue about pricing! You are our ideal client and I hate it that we completely missed your second quarterly cleanup! We truly missed a great opportunity at maintaining a quality professional relationship and I truly am sorry about that! This spring was definitively rough on us from employees being sick, employees being scared to come into work (pandemic)  and season change took a real toll on us as a team. Some days I couldn't even bring myself to look at my phone from being so overwhelmed by the day.. i feel we have survived the worst of the worst by now and are still here. If by chance you ever find yourself in need again reach out and give us another shot! I promise we'll be there for you!

Marcus with Mitchumlawn

name: Paula Berg
text: We had Tru Green for 2 years and still have just as many weeds as when they started. We paid over $1300.00 for the 2 years of service. We decided not to use them this year. Apparently if you do not cancel them they will still come service the yard the next year without permission. I came home and found a sign in my yard that says We didn't service your lawn today but we'd like to in the future. The next day we get a bill online for $94.45. I called and asked them why I was being charged if they didn't do anything. She said they did service the yard but would wave that charge if I signed up for service. Sounds like blackmail to me. I declined and had to pay the $94.45. I told her I didn't want them back on my property again.

resp.text: Hi Paula, we sincerely apologize for your negative experience. Please email us at reviews@trugreenmail.com with your name and phone number so we can look into this. Thanks for your feedback as it is one of the many ways we can improve our services.

resp.text: Hi there, we apologize for any inconvenience this has caused you. We will be happy to take you off of our call list. Please email us at reviews@trugreenmail.com, and a member of our team will assist you from there. Thank you!

name: Shawn Nelson
text:
One year of service and my lawn looks horrible. Caught the technician treating my neighbors house by mistake, not the first time my neighbor got a free treatment. Had one technician treat during a thunderstorm downpour, and customer service had the audacity to say that the treatment would work in rain.
I now have dandelions, clover, and various broad leaf weeds growing in the front and side yard as well crab grass springing up in new places. Very disappointing and expensive failure.

Update:
A very knowledgeable lawn technician conducted a thorough fertilization and weed control application one month ago and the lawn is recovering. He explained that due to the mixed grass I have, they had been killing the fescue and encouraging the bermuda growth. This resulted in large dead areas that were previously fescue. Reseeding (done by me) with bermuda has taken and the lawn is recovering.

Recommend better explanation and consequences of  recommended treatments to homeowners. Thank you for trying to fix the problem.

resp.text: Hi Shawn, We appreciate you for bringing this to our attention. We will follow up with the right teams to ensure this doesn’t happen again. Please email us at reviews@trugreenmail.com with your account information so that we can get this taken care of!

I called over 10 times to get help repairing my brown lawn.  Do yourself a favor and look elsewhere for lawn fertilizer and weed control unless you want a destroyed lawn.
